name: Tokyo
hint: The capital of Japan and the most populous metropolitan area in the world

name: Beijing
hint: China's capital city, home to the Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square

name: Mumbai
hint: India's financial capital, formerly known as Bombay, on the west coast

name: Delhi
hint: India's capital territory, one of the oldest continuously inhabited cities in the world

name: Shanghai
hint: China's largest city by population, a global financial hub at the Yangtze River Delta

name: Seoul
hint: The capital of South Korea, divided from its northern counterpart by a demilitarized zone

name: Bangkok
hint: Thailand's capital, known for ornate temples and vibrant street life along the Chao Phraya River

name: Jakarta
hint: The capital of Indonesia, located on the northwest coast of Java

name: Riyadh
hint: The capital of Saudi Arabia, located in the center of the Arabian Peninsula

name: Singapore
hint: A city-state and island country at the southern tip of the Malay Peninsula

name: Kuala Lumpur
hint: Malaysia's capital, famous for the Petronas Twin Towers

name: Dubai
hint: A city in the UAE known for luxury shopping, ultramodern architecture, and the Burj Khalifa
